CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All of the polymers studied were found to exhibit good thermal stability , losing less than 5% of their weight upon heating to approximately 350 ° C. Perylene-containing polymers showed higher field - effect mobilities than the corresponding PFDTBT or PFD2TBT polymers because of the enhanced π-π interaction between polymer chains upon the introduction of perylene units.

Paragraph: All of the polymers studied were found to exhibit good thermal stability , losing less than 5% of their weight upon heating to approximately 350 ° C. Perylene-containing polymers showed higher field - effect mobilities than the corresponding PFDTBT or PFD2TBT polymers because of the enhanced π-π interaction between polymer chains upon the introduction of perylene units.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| good thermal stability |
| losing less than 5% of their weight upon heating to approximately 350 ° C |
| higher field-effect mobilities for perylene-containing polymers |
| enhanced π-π interaction between polymer chains |

In this paragraph, "good thermal stability" and "losing less than 5% of their weight upon heating to approximately 350 ° C" describe a property of the polymers. "Higher field-effect mobilities for perylene-containing polymers" and "enhanced π-π interaction between polymer chains for perylene units" describe differences between specific types of polymers.
